rows.translation: When comes the Help of Allah, and Victory,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
rows.translation: And thou dost see the people enter Allah's Religion in crowds,
rows.transliteration: wara-aytan nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīnillāhi afwājā

rows.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
rows.translation: Celebrate the praises of thy Lord, and pray for His Forgiveness: For He is Oft-Returning (in Grace and Mercy).
rows.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastaghfirh ۚ innahu kāna tawwābā
